channel.title: Crane Game chances?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Crane Game chances?"

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: No, every time you try or kick the machine, a new item rolls up, and that item has a chance to be a crane (animal)

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: so do you have to win to make the crane X appear?

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: Crane Xs appear randomly appear in the machine when playing the crane game. If they appear, you'll get a message saying there was a crane x underneath your prize. It will then be available to be won, and can be kicked for.

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: The Crane Crane has a random chance of appearing which means more tries at the Super Hard or kicking it(-2 stamina) Till it appears.

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: No you are just changing the price you may win when you play that round…

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: so can i just kick the machine untill a crane crane drops

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded:
Kicking the machine is suppose to change what's available at each level of difficulty. If they're not changing, after five or so kicks, then ask your kage if there's only one kind of item at each level of difficulty.

On the plus side, if you manage to make a crane item appear (crane crane, crane cougar, etc) kicking the machine can make them show up, even if the kage only put in food pills or something like that at a given level of difficulty.

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: i'm new so bear with me… what good does kicking the machine do the prizes dont change, and are the prizes random or is there a specific order to them

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: You all must have disgustin luck…..40000 5 CraneCranes….Its easy when you are the Kage. Also got 3 Regalia's and 2 Polar Stars from it….

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: I know a while back i spent about 30k and got a Crane Crane to come out, but I didn't end up winning it, someone else did.

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: Honestly, I'd expect a minimum of 1 mil Ryo.

item.title: Re: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded: 20k ^^ thats nothing… I know for a fact that me and a village ally spent more than 250k with only a Crane Crane in the the Super Hard slot without a win… so just keep at it cos it can take quite some spending to get it!

item.title: Crane Game chances?
item.content:encoded:
anyone know the chance to win a Crane Crane from the Crane Game?

*EDIT*
just spent 20k at 100 per try on Super Hard Difficulty, got 2 tasty burgers and the ally, no Crane Crane
